channel.title: Incheon on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: A trip to September, with trees, and Incheon Grand Park Wood Culture Experience Center Mokyeon-ri - Namdong-gu, Incheon, Korea
item.description:
World Architecture Award and Red Dot Design Award Main Prize

A trip to September, with trees, and Incheon Grand Park Wood Culture Experience Center Mokyeon-ri

Namdong-gu, Incheon, Korea

I have a carpenter friend. When asked about the merits of work, the answer is, "I can touch the tree." I also like to touch trees. The texture of the wood is 'emotional' compared to other objects. Not smooth but calm While living in wood, even after dying in furniture and books. So when you touch a tree, 'good' and 'reliable' are pushed to one side of your heart.

#Woodworking experience # Mokyeon-ri #Incheon Arboretum #Incheon Arboretum #Attractions #Amazing Dating #September Travel #Nagolo Walking #Half Day Family Outing #Design Tour #Art Tour #Architecture #World Architecture Awards #Red Dot Design Award #Ecology learning

On a clear autumn day, I went to Incheon to touch the trees. There are many wood culture experience places. But why is it Incheon? Mokyeon-ri, a wooden cultural experience center in Incheon Grand Park, is a special place. One huge design.
Incheon Grand Park Wood Culture Experience Center
Unlike the existing timber culture center, it is a modern exposed concrete building. Special wooden devices also give life to the body. Or is it the World Architecture Community (WAC) World Architecture Award and the Red Dot Design Award Concept? The name of the grand park, the zelkova tunnel, the buckwheat blossoms and the cosmos under the ground can also make you flutter.
1st floor ambience wall
Make Dad and Mom Together: With Family
Mokyeon-ri, Incheon Grand Park Wood Culture Experience Center, is a two-story building. On the first floor, there is a ginkgo workshop used by elementary school students and adults. The zelkova workshop on the second floor has a family. Children make their parents, cloud-shaped plates, planes, and so on. Although it is at the level of duke, the imagination of the filmmaker's hand is rough.
Incheon Grand Park Wood Culture Experience Center Mokyeon-ri
Next to the zelkova workshop on the 2nd floor is the Cloud Playground. It is full of wooden toys such as tool play and train play. The pool full of cypress balls is especially popular. It's a phytoncide playground. The lobby on the second floor is rich in wood, due to the tight planks on the ceiling.
Incheon Arboretum Promenade
You may want to give the children an explanation of a tree like a cypress ball pool.
Cloud Playground Cypress Ball Pool
There is a nail and sawing experience in the lobby on the first floor. If you drop by, it's worth a try. There is an angel wing photo zone on the entrance wall of the building. Wood Experience Center Mokyeon-ri is adjacent to Incheon Arboretum. It is a good size for a light walk with children. If you want to visit the grand park together, the southern wetlands, pampas grass, and infant forest experience center are suitable for autumn ecological learning.
Ginkgo workshop woodwork experience for elementary school students and adults
Like a tree if you love: with a lover or friend
Ginkgo workshop on the first floor is perfect when you're with a lover or a friend. Make living supplies such as wooden speakers, mini-shops, and reading stands. It is a form of assembling wooden boards prepared in advance, but the process of touching and pasting wood is more interesting than you think. Sometimes they come in loved ones or friends and make each other's gifts.
To relax and enjoy Mokyeon-ri's architecture, head to the outdoor deck shelter next to the 2nd Floor Cloud Playground. Corresponds to the inside of the triangle's acute angle. In the circumference, a wooden board shaped like '∧' is stacked to form a screen. In the meantime, relax and enjoy the view of Incheon Grand Park or Arboretum. Floor patterns vary when shadows are cast. Carpentry experiences are scheduled for both workshops twice a week and three weekends. The experience fee (excluding material cost) is inexpensive at 2000-3000 won.
Pin McMoon-Dong Flower on Grand Park Walkway
After leaving Mokyeon-ri, go to Incheon Grand Park zelkova path. Zelkova trees are tunneled and romantic. Even before the autumn leaves are worth seeing. By mid-September, the purple McMoon-Dong flowers are present in India.
Oul Garden where you can see the flowers and cosmos
Lovers are encouraged to rent bicycles for couples at the bike square. If you rent a bicycle, you will go to the alumni garden of the Alumni side. In late September, buckwheat flowers are in full bloom. There are several beans in the middle of the buckwheat field. Why don't you read a book and make a fairy tale in autumn? Cosmos that sometimes fly adds to the mood of autumn.
Zelkova road couple bicycle
Alone Design Tour: Solo Yolo
Let's take a design tour for a trip alone. Incheon Grand Park Wood Culture Experience Center Mok Yeon Lee was noted as one of the 'hot' buildings in the first half, winning the World Architecture Community World Architecture Award after the Red Dot Design Award Concept Award.
Incheon Grand Park Wood Culture Experience Center
The first thing to look out for is the `` Ambience Wall, '' which decorates the first floor and the second floor. It is the name of the screen which stacked 8 ~ 9 wooden boards shaped like '∧' on the exterior of a building.
Ambience Wall is another highlight of shadow changes
I embodied our traditional door. The appearance varies depending on the direction you are looking, adding to the pleasure of taking pictures. Ambience Wall is a kinetic architecture (moving architecture) that distinguishes wood culture experiences from other architectural designs.
Ambience wall looks different depending on direction
There is also a hidden function. The stacked '∧' angle increases and decreases as the pole moves. However, it's a pity that you can't see it because it is only tested in special cases. Nevertheless, with that in mind, the building looks more abundant.
Building concrete wall wood pattern
For photography, we recommend a trail that enters from the park stand. Brown 'ambience walls' stand out among the pine branches. The interior contrasts the pattern of two-storey oak planks and ambience walls. At sunset, the shadows of the ambience wall change to create an interesting pattern. The concrete part of the building is colorful, expressing the texture of the tree.
Ambience Wall comes in a variety of photos depending on the direction

If you just feel sorry for Mokyeonri, you will take a walk to the Arboretum. Relaxing for about an hour along the forest path. If you walk alone, the trees in the forest seem to touch your heart.


Traffic tips: When using the subway in Seoul, it is faster to transfer the bus at Songnae Station than Incheon Grand Park Station. From July, the limited express (Yongsan Station-Dongincheon Station) subway will operate nine one-way trips (between 9:00 am and 5:00 pm). It takes 26 minutes from Yongsan Station to Songnae Station.

Arboretum entrance with willow
Travel info

Incheon Grand Park Wood Culture Experience Center Mokyeon-ri

Inquiries: 032-440-5850, 5822

http://www.stellarmarinahotel.com/

※ The above information was made in September 2017. It may change afterwards, so please check before you travel.

item.title: 4.5 billion Asian festivals! Compete for over 3000 medals in 36 events
item.description:
Opening ceremony of the 17th Incheon Asian Games

4.5 billion Asian festivals! Compete for over 3000 medals in 36 events

Seo-gu, Incheon, South Korea

On September 19, the 17th Incheon Asian Games started with the opening ceremony of Incheon Asiad Main Stadium in Incheon, Korea. 45 Asian countries, including Korea, China, and Japan, compete for over 3000 medals in 36 sports (28 Olympics and 8 Olympics) including basketball, rugby, archery, weightlifting, swimming, canoeing and boxing. The event, which includes all members of the Asian Olympic Council (OCA), including North Korea, will be held for 16 days until October 4. The third Asian Games to be held in Korea is the third after Seoul in 1986 and Busan in 2002. As of 2014, only Thailand (4) and South Korea have hosted more than three Asian Games.

Departure begins at the opening ceremony of Incheon Asiad Main Stadium on September 19, 2014
Before looking at the full schedule, let's take a look at the Incheon Asiad Main Stadium, which was completed for the Incheon Asian Games. It boasts a floor area of 11,620m2 (approximately 34,000 pyeong) and five floors and more than 60,000 seats. The competition started with the opening ceremony of Incheon Asiad Main Stadium. It is held in Incheon and Suwon Gymnasium (Handball), Munhak Park Tae-hwan Swimming Pool (Swimming). If you're a sports fan, it's a good idea to check the location of the stadium to create a line.
Opening Ceremony of 2014 Incheon Asian Games
A game of over 3000 medals. How should we look? Since we cannot introduce all the schedules, we arranged the schedules focusing on handball, swimming, archery, and gymnastics games loved by Koreans, mainly soccer, baseball, and basketball.
Opening Torch Light

First of all, the soccer became fun until the 2002 Korea-Japan World Cup. The final will take place at the Literature Stadium on October 2. In the soccer qualifiers held on September 21st, the Korean men's team beat Laos 2-0 and the women's team beat Maldives 13-0. Baseball, which started on the 22nd, won 15-0 against Thailand. The semi-finals and finals will take place on the 27th and 28th after the match against Hong Kong on the 24th. All take place at the Literary Baseball Stadium. Basketball is scheduled to play against Jordan at the Samsan World Gymnasium on the 25th. On the 28th, the quarter finals will be held at the Hwaseong Stadium.

Kim Young-Soo Chairman, Organizing Committee, Asian Games
Match schedule? It's not difficult!

Marine Boy Park Tae-hwan's swimming game is not to be missed. On the 21st, they won bronze medals in the men's freestyle 200m final and the men's freestyle 400m final on the 23rd. The freestyle 100m preliminaries are scheduled for 9 am on the 25th.

Gymnastics Fairy Son Yeon-jae will compete in the rhythmic gymnastics individual qualifiers on October 1 at Namdong Gymnasium. The rhythmic gymnastics consists of four events: ribbon, ball, club and hoop. There was a medal in gymnastics. On the 23rd, Lee Sang-wook won the bronze medal in the Men's Gymnastics Men's Final, and Yun Na-rae added another bronze medal in the Women's Individual Final. On the 24th, Yang Hak-sun will play in the final match of the gymnastics men's floor exercise, and will play against Li Segwang of North Korea. Gymnastics is the exercise of postponing body movements using machines. Express stability, difficulty, elegance and originality. Men's sports are Maru, Cheolbong, Parallel Bar, Massage, Ring, Chopping Board, and Women's Floor, Average Bar, Double Parallel Bar, Chopping Board.
Traditional medallion archery. The Republic of Korea breathes on a single arrow that cuts off the target. Archery won eight gold medals, including the 2014 Incheon Asian Games and the newly added compound. In the men's group qualification round (compound) held on the 23rd, Choi Yong-hee (2nd) and Yang Young-ho (5th) played in the men's individual qualification round. The women's team also took first place in the Compound Women's Qualifying Round and Choi Bo-min (1st) and Seok Ji-hyun (2nd) in the individual qualification round. The game is played every day until the 28th.
Wait here! There are two types of archery: a recurve bow and a compound bow. All archery we have seen in the meantime is recurve. Compound archery hasn't been an Olympic or Asian competition. However, attention has been increasing as it was adopted as a regular sport since the Incheon Asian Games. What is the difference between the two? As the name implies, the bow structure is different. If the recurve is a traditional bow, the compound is a mechanical bow. The recurve is heavy and sensitive, so the player's concentration is important. Thinking of the archery field in the meantime makes it easier to understand. Compounds, on the other hand, are lighter and smaller than mechanical arrowhead recurve arrows that are easy to learn for beginners with pulleys and sights.
In the finals of the badminton men's team where the opposition hero Lee Yong-dae played on the 23rd, he added a gold medal. The men's and women's mixed singles and doubles games will be held until the 29th. In addition, medal competitions will be held in 36 events including judo, shooting, cycling, and land. As of September 24, 2014, South Korea is ranked second overall with 61 medals, including 20 gold, 19 silver and 22 bronze.
Judo Qualification
Indeed, don't forget the seal of three children, Vichuon, Barame, and Chumyeon, the mascots of the Incheon Asian Games. The mascot of the convention has influenced the image of the competition. As the name suggests, the eldest son of the Incheon Asian Games, Bichuon, is, as the name suggests, 'the messenger of light shining hope on the whole world'. Was taken from. Why don't you enjoy the festival of autumn, wind, light and wind?
Panoramic view of Literary Park Tae Hwan Swimming Pool
Travel info

Incheon Asiad Main Stadium
Address: 806, Bongsu-daero, Seo-gu, Incheon (Yeonhee-dong)
Contact: 032-458-2014

http://www.incheon2014ag.org/
